typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DimCustomers
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DimCities
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Dimstockitems
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ODSOrders
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ODSOrderlines
DimCustomers select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectcustomers
DimCities select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCities
Dimstockitems select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectStockitems
ODSOrderlines select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
ODSOrders select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, Select2 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3, selectcustomers join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select5, SelectCities join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
